definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: and the mother was very, very disturbed.
sentences.chinese: 拿着水枪玩耍，喷得到处都是水，让妈妈非常生气。

sentences.english: Police fired  water cannon to  halt the protesters.
sentences.chinese: 警察用防爆水枪阻止抗议者前进。

sentences.english: Both have helicopters and water cannon.
sentences.chinese: 双方都备有直升机和高压水枪。

sentences.english: Q. How do I size nozzles for a multiple gun system?
sentences.chinese: 问题对于一个多水枪系统我应选择多大的喷嘴？

sentences.english: Kept playing their spouts of water into the blaze.
Maybe it was for my video camera, a rubber band shooter or a water gun aimer .
sentences.chinese: 也许是我的摄像机，橡皮筋射击或水枪爱慕。

sentences.english: Look for any signs of leaking between the gun and the unloader valve.
sentences.chinese: 检查一下水枪和减压阀是否有泄漏的迹象。

sentences.english: Even a water gun can shake its foundations?' writes a reveler named Ashkan on his Facebook page.
sentences.chinese: 一只水枪竟能撼动它的根基？
